Recommendations: a collection development policy for the program under survey may be formulate to serve as a guide in the preparation of book development plan for the major field of specialization the policy formulate may be review and evaluate by the library committee

continuous acquisition of book of recent edition for major subject of specialization of the program under survey may be prioritize to support the instructional and research need of the mmsu academic community

there is a need to expedite the rehabilitation of the library building particularly the west wing area which be affected by the typhoon service and section locate in the affected area be need to be in full operation to comply with high level of accreditation and support the need of the mmsu library user

library environment may be improve by instal the acquire airconditioning unit at the reading area and service section to make them conducive to learn and to maintain the humidity need for the collection and electronic equipment

the library in coordination with the it department may explore way and mean to preserve and conserve the vast collection of vertical file and archival collection and provide digital copy in ding center for a wider access of student and faculty
